channel.title: FBI on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in FBI on ECTHRwatch

item.title: 给Adam Rogalski (国务院, 联邦调查局) 和Mahonri Manjarrez (联邦调查局)发邮件。
item.description:
2022-03-11, 我给F.B.I.（联邦调查局）发了三封邮件。

这是发送于北京时间19:38 的第三封邮件。这封邮件发给了Rogalski 先生和Manjarrez先生。

FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: 严重欺诈的三个具体实例。

item.title: Email sent to the F.B.I. about Xi Jinping (习近平), the President of the People’s Republic of China, and Li Keqiang (李克强), the Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China.
item.description:
On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the second email which was sent at 16:36 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez. It’s about the XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org websites.

发件人: 为了保护涉及此案的受害者/关键证人/举报人，我会手动隐去姓名］（上述备注实属不得已，如果您想了解其中隐情或我的更多故事，您可以访问 X-v-France.com）

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: XiJinping.fr and LiKeqiang.org

item.title: 克里斯托弗·亞瑟·雷 (英語：Christopher Asher WRAY)
item.description: 克里斯托弗·亞瑟·雷 (Christopher Asher WRAY) Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For
